author: Asabi Oduntan
title: how to create pages in React.js using react-router-dom
content: React Router is a fully-featured client and server-side routing library for React, a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. React Router runs anywhere React runs; on the web, on the server with node.js, and on React Native.

author: Femi Sholagbade
title: How to create data grid using react-table
content: Building accessible data grids for the web is hard—they’re incredibly complex UI components. React developers face an extra challenge when building data tables because of how React works under the hood. One React-specific challenge is that a parent component doesn’t necessarily know the current state of the child component

author: Simisola Olajide
title: Imoprtance of a Yoruba Nation
content: Yorubaland is the cultural region of the Yoruba people in West Africa. It spans the modern-day countries of Nigeria, Togo, and Benin. Its pre-modern history is based largely on oral traditions and legends. According to Yoruba religion, Oduduwa became the ancestor of the first divine king of the Yoruba

author: Ifadare Ojoyebisi
title: How to make a man fall in love with you
